changelog:
## Changes in v1.0.36

### Sync Performance Improvements
- Added HTTP HEAD check before downloading playlist (10x faster if no changes)
- Removed redundant 6-hour skip logic that conflicted with user intervals
- Reduced initial auto-update delay from 1 hour to 5 minutes

### How it works now
- First checks if playlist changed (instant if server supports ETag/Last-Modified)
- Only downloads if content actually changed
- Falls back to full download if server doesn't support change detection

### Previous fixes
- v1.0.35: Sport section channel navigation fix
